title: How to Draw a Human Head

steps.title: Start by drawing three oval shapes, one large one and 2 smaller ones on the left and right side of the large oval.
steps.content: Start by drawing three oval shapes, one large one and 2 smaller ones on the left and right side of the large oval. Add also thin guidelines such as a vertical line and two horizontal lines to serve as a guide in drawing the eyes and mouth of the model.

steps.title: Use the first guideline to draw the eyes.
steps.content: Use the first guideline to draw the eyes. In drawing the eyes draw a pointy oblong shape with four circles in it, add also some wavy eyelashes since for this picture the model used is a young woman.

steps.title: Add a pair sculpted eyebrows and some lines to illustrate the eyelid.
steps.content: Add a pair sculpted eyebrows and some lines to illustrate the eyelid.

steps.title: Make the nose.
steps.content: Make the nose. Then in the middle of the face and along the vertical guideline draw now his/ her nose. In drawing the nose, remember to make the lines broken to achieve an effect.

steps.title: Draw the lips on the second horizontal guideline.
steps.content: Draw the lips on the second horizontal guideline.

steps.title: Finally draw the hair and a squiggly line on the left ear and you’re done drawing the face.
steps.content: Finally draw the hair and a squiggly line on the left ear and you’re done drawing the face.

steps.title: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker and then apply an amount of shading on your drawing using a charcoal pencil or a regular pencil.
steps.content: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker and then apply an amount of shading on your drawing using a charcoal pencil or a regular pencil. And then apply a minimal amount of color by coloring the lips and eyes.

steps.title: Draw a profile of a human head.
steps.content: Draw a profile of a human head. Start this step by drawing a bald human head and by drawing the contours of the model’s nose and lips. Add also an oblong shape for the ear.

steps.title: Draw the eyes of the model, however draw only one eye and one eyebrow.
steps.content: Draw the eyes of the model, however draw only one eye and one eyebrow. Draw the eye by drawing first a triangular shape.

steps.title: Make the nose and mouth of the model.
steps.content: Make the nose and mouth of the model. Draw the lips of the model by copying the shape of a heart positioned horizontally.

steps.title: Add the details of one ear by drawing squiggly lines.
steps.content: Add the details of one ear by drawing squiggly lines.

steps.title: End drawing by sketching her hair in a bun if you like.
steps.content: End drawing by sketching her hair in a bun if you like.

steps.title: Ink and color your drawing and you’re done with the second drawing!
steps.content: Ink and color your drawing and you’re done with the second drawing! Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker; add some pencil shading and then apply a minimal amount of color.
